B

BaseDAO - Class in DAO
Represents the superclass of all DAO class that serves common functionalities
BaseDAO() - Constructor for class DAO.BaseDAO
 
BASEPATH - Variable in class DAO.BookingDAO
Base path of booking database for readability
BASEPATH - Variable in class DAO.CinemaDAO
Base path of cinema database for readability
BASEPATH - Variable in class DAO.ReviewDAO
Base path of review database for readability
BASEPATH - Variable in class DAO.ShowtimeDAO
Base path of showtime database for readability
bookedMovies(int) - Static method in class controller.ReviewController
Get all booked movies by a particular MovieGoer
Booking - Class in model
Represents the booking object
Booking(int, String, String, int, String, String, float) - Constructor for class model.Booking
Constructor for creating booking object with the ability to store meta information regarding booking
bookingController - Variable in class model.MovieGoer
The booking controller related to the moviegoer containing all past booking of her/him
BookingController - Class in controller
Controller for movie booking functionality and store all bookings, each booking controller is owned my one MovieGoer object
BookingController(int) - Constructor for class controller.BookingController
Constructor to create Booking Controller object, automatically load bookings data from the database
bookingDao - Variable in class controller.BookingController
BookingDAO to get and save data to database
BookingDAO - Class in DAO
Represents data access object related to booking information
BookingDAO() - Constructor for class DAO.BookingDAO
 
bookingList - Variable in class controller.BookingController
Contains an ArrayList of all available bookings for this user
BookingUI - Class in boundary
Represents the boundary of booking flow Consisting of multiple methods which interact directly with cineplexController, movieController, and movieGoerController
BookingUI() - Constructor for class boundary.BookingUI
 
bookSeat() - Method in class model.Seat
Books the seat by setting the indicator of booked to be true
bookSeats(String, int) - Method in class controller.SeatController
Book seats by indicating starting seat and the number of seats
boundary - package boundary
 
bw - Static variable in class DAO.UtilDAO
Buffered writer in order to do CRUD operation
